info.name: N24 mediathek viewing pleasure
info.description: makes the whole N24 Mediathek completely  black, and removes everything which is unnecessary for viewing.
info.additionalInfo:
The only things which are still there:

1. Top Header Bar
2. Heading and Subheading (both original colors)
3. The video itself (can't color that one with CSS)
4. Video Date and remaining time
5. Rating
6. Description
7. Tags and Category

Page background completely black


bugs:
Scrollbar visible when resizing horizontally, even though the minimum page width isn't yet reached.

06.03.2014 - v1.0 Initial Release
